episode_event_ch0289_00_nemo/4001_1001_0: What? No, I don’t want to battle just yet...

There’s something I need your help with, and it’s
gotta be you!

You know how a lot of strong Trainers from
different regions come to Pasio, right?

I thought it'd be nice if we could gather ’em all
together and have tons of battles!

I bet it’ll be a fruitful experience for the both
of us!

So [Name:PlayerNickname ]—can you help me
gather people?
episode_event_ch0289_00_nemo/4001_0402_1:
Oops! Couldn’t hear you! I’ll say it again:
you wanna battle Trainers from different
regions, right?!

Sorry, not going to stop until I hear a yes!
I wanna battle against Trainers from
different regions!
OK, wait! You WILL battle, won't you?!
episode_event_ch0289_00_nemo/4001_1001_1:
You have a lot of strong Trainers as friends, so I’m
really excited!

I’ll go talk to as many strong-looking Trainers
as I can!
